content.rendered:
Order Now With Confidence With Our 100% Money Back Guarantee.

Try out the Sugar Balance Program for a full 180 days and if you don’t balance your blood sugar or don’t experience the best health of your life, we’ll gladly refund all your money, no questions asked. There’s absolutely no risk in giving it a try.

We’ve spent years developing the Sugar Balance Program and believe it is the best way to balance your blood sugar levels. We strive to create the highest quality products available and to provide the best customer experience in the industry. Which is why we offer a 180 day, 100% money back guarantee.

Here’s How It Works:

If for any reason you’re dissatisfied at any time during the first 180 days after purchase, simply call or email us with the information below and you’ll get all your money back. You don’t even have to ship back the product. That’s how confident we are that you’ll get amazing results.

Contacting Support

  •  Phone

    1-866-460-6008 (24/7)

  •  Email

    support@getsugarbalance.com

Refund Processing Time

Once we process your refund, you’ll receive an email showing that it’s complete. Please note, it can take some time for it to show up on your credit card statement depending on your bank or credit card company.

  • Paid By / Refund ToBank Process Time
  • Credit Card5-7 Business Days
  • Debit Card5-10 Business Days

Improving Customer Experience

Finally, to help us continually improve and provide the best customer service possible, we ask that you let us know why you returned the product. You may also include an recommendations or suggestion to help us improve the experience for others. This is totally optional and isn’t required to get your refunds. We want satisfied customers and appreciate and welcome your feedback.

Thank you!
